achievements.name: Bone-Cronch
achievements.description: A skeleton cronches through thick yellow peel. Attack it and kill it before it can heal!

achievements.name: A Titanic Ensemble
achievements.description: A pirate may choose to go down with their ship. A musical send-off concludes their sad trip!

achievements.name: Dead Pirates DO Tell Tales
achievements.description: All on the Ferry are sister and brother. Send forth a message to someone or other!

achievements.name: Hold My Grog!
achievements.description: Launched from your vessel, this cannon-fired trip must see you land safe on the deck of a ship!

achievements.name: I Don’t See Your Ship
achievements.description: You fought a crew, stood strong and brave and sent their ship to a watery grave!

achievements.name: Laden With Treasure
achievements.description: You've overcome a score of tests and now you're hoarding twenty chests!

achievements.name: I'm On A Whole New Adventure
achievements.description: So many voyages, but which one to do? Stow yours and vote for one placed by your crew.

achievements.name: You Can Always Trust The Untrustworthy
achievements.description: Plundered from an unwary crew, their Captain's Chest cashed in - by you!

achievements.name: When You're A Professional Pirate
achievements.description: Commendations are given by Companies when you've reached certain targets. Try to earn ten!

achievements.name: Tactical Chunder
achievements.description: When threatened at sword point, remember this trick: blind your poor foe with a bucket of sick!

achievements.name: Now Bring Me That Horizon
achievements.description: Each new pirate greets the world with anchor raised and sails unfurled!

achievements.name: Full Billow
achievements.description: All sails with the wind, what time it saves when speeding across the ocean's waves!

achievements.name: Handbrake Turn
achievements.description: To swiftly avoid a great danger you're dreading, steer hard and drop anchor to alter your heading!

achievements.name: I Wanna Be A Pirate!
achievements.description: A Company's pleased and you've reason to revel if your Reputation increased by one level!

achievements.name: Shopping for a Promotion
achievements.description: Your Voyages have earned you enough recognition so buy a Promotion and prove your position!

achievements.name: I'll Drink To That
achievements.description: Two different crews, their tankards held high, will meet at a tavern and drain them all dry!

achievements.name: What Shall We Do with a Drunken Sailor?
achievements.description: Too many tankards of sweet, golden grog will first make you queasy, then sick as a dog…

achievements.name: #BeMorePirate
achievements.description: A peg-leg, an eyepatch, a hat and a hook, all purchased to pull off the true pirate look!

achievements.name: Aye of Reach
achievements.description: Visit the Weaponsmith, you'll find they teach the value of buying a new Eye of Reach!

achievements.name: Blundarrrrbuss
achievements.description: The Weaponsmith's open, you'll see it's no fuss to purchase a glorious new blunderbuss!

achievements.name: Colourful Sails
achievements.description: Make your first buy from the Shipwright, who deals in figureheads, cannons, new sails and wheels!

achievements.name: You Fight Like A Merchant
achievements.description: Dexterous swordplay can keep you alive. Block an attack and then strike within five!

achievements.name: How Appropriate! You Fight Like A Chicken
achievements.description: Your trusty blade was just too slow. Now it's your turn to feel their blow!

achievements.name: But You Have Heard Of Me?
achievements.description: Your reputation is starting to thrive. Grab your Promotion, you've reached twenty-five!

achievements.name: Self Entitled
achievements.description: Titles are gathered from deeds near and far. Earn ten to show what type of pirate you are!

achievements.name: In Good Company
achievements.description: A Company's items are sold to the loyal, five upgrades rewards you with their finest spoil!

achievements.name: Did Everyone See That?
achievements.description: A heavy attack while you've boarded their ship may send your foe over the side for a dip!

achievements.name: Become Pirate Legend
achievements.description: A true Pirate Legend is one of the greats and for them, Athena's Fortune awaits…

achievements.name: Ignoring The Rules Of Engagement
achievements.description: To strike from behind is a sneaky attack that leads to a blunderbuss shot in the back!

achievements.name: Kraken Good Job
achievements.description: From under the waves a great creature arrived but you drove it away. Better still, you survived!

achievements.name: Perfect Dark
achievements.description: Through stormy seas in silent flight, no lanterns lit to pierce the night.

achievements.name: Friends Not Foe
achievements.description: A greeting, when given with Pirate Salute, can make a new friend - or perhaps a recruit!

achievements.name: Legends - "Cronch"
achievements.description: Just like Griffin, your pirate kin, 'cronch' a banana and eat its skin!

achievements.name: Legends - "The Greatest Race of All Time!"
achievements.description: Side by side, two ships must race with weapons silenced for first place!

achievements.name: Legends - "This is Unacceptable!"
achievements.description: A chest of yours has gone astray and been cashed in as some thief's pay!

achievements.name: Legends - "The Skullduggers"
achievements.description: Five legends from across the sea playing instruments in harmony!

achievements.name: It's A Pirates Life For Me
achievements.description: The Voyage is done; a chest of old now safe with those who hoard their gold!

achievements.name: Master Gold Hoarder
achievements.description: You've gathered gold from near and far. A Master Hoarder now, you are!

achievements.name: Taking Orders
achievements.description: Your Voyage complete, a skull returned, praise from the Order thusly earned!

achievements.name: Master of the Order
achievements.description: Sun-bleached skulls from across the ocean earn the Order's highest Promotion!

achievements.name: I Am Not Obsessed With Treasure
achievements.description: A Voyage is over, back to land a merchant's cargo in your hand!

achievements.name: Master Merchant
achievements.description: The Merchant Alliance applauds your devotion bestowing upon you a Master Promotion!

achievements.name: Seeker of Lost Maps
achievements.description: Dig Up 250 chests whilst on Gold Hoarder X Marks the Spot Voyages.

achievements.name: Golden Voyager
achievements.description: Receive the Commendation for completing 250 Gold Hoarder Voyages.

achievements.name: Sailor of the Gold Horizon
achievements.description: Receive the Commendation for sailing 1,000 nautical miles on Gold Hoarder voyages.

achievements.name: Hoarder of Barnacled Gold
achievements.description: Receive the Commendation for selling 300 Shipwrecked Chests.

achievements.name: Keeper of a Glittering Hoard
achievements.description: Receive the Commendation for earning 150,000 gold from Gold Hoarder voyages.

achievements.name: Hoarder of the Captain’s Gold
achievements.description: Receive the Commendation for selling 360 Captain’s Chests.

achievements.name: Merchant Adventurer
achievements.description: Correctly fill 250 animal crates whilst on Merchant Alliance Contract Voyages.

achievements.name: Merchant Voyager
achievements.description: Receive the Commendation for completing 250 Merchant Alliance Voyages.

achievements.name: Sailor of the Merchant Alliance
achievements.description: Receive the Commendation for sailing 1,000 nautical miles on Merchant Alliance Voyages.

achievements.name: Black Powder Merchant
achievements.description: Receive the Commendation for delivering 100 Gunpowder Kegs on time.

achievements.name: Merchant Forager
achievements.description: Receive the Commendation for delivering 50 Fruit Crates on time.

achievements.name: Gilded Merchant
achievements.description: Receive the Commendation for earning 150,000 gold from Merchant Alliance Voyages.

achievements.name: Seeker of Lost Souls
achievements.description: Defeat 500 skeletons on an Order of Souls Bounty Voyage.

achievements.name: Voyager of Lost Souls
achievements.description: Receive the Commendation for completing 250 Order of Souls Voyages.

achievements.name: Sailor of the Whispering Bones
achievements.description: Receive the Commendation for sailing 1,000 nautical miles on Order of Souls Voyages.

achievements.name: Hunter of Cursed Captains
achievements.description: Receive the Commendation for defeating 1,000 Skeleton Captains.

achievements.name: Mercenary of the Ancient Order
achievements.description: Receive the Commendation for earning 150,000 gold from Order of Souls Voyages.

achievements.name: Master Hunter Of Villainous Skulls
achievements.description: Receive the Commendation for selling 360 Villainous Skulls.

achievements.name: Dining With the Stars
achievements.description: A midnight snack, if you desire, cooked to perfection on a fire!

achievements.name: Well Done!
achievements.description: Your hearty meal's turned out wrong.  You left it on the stove too long!

achievements.name: Not So Well Done
achievements.description: Well-cooked meals are never easy,  dine too soon and you'll get queasy!

achievements.name: Five a Day
achievements.description: Sampling every type of fruit  will keep you fit to fight and loot!

achievements.name: Another Pirate's Treasure
achievements.description: Ill-gotten gains - yet, after all,  they still sold to the Hunter's Call.

achievements.name: Night Bite
achievements.description: Little fishie, all aglow,  off to The Hunter's Call you go.

achievements.name: A Rare Delicacy
achievements.description: If reeling a coloured fish in, take care,  The Hunter's Call claim they're incredibly rare!

achievements.name: Meat and Greet
achievements.description: A feast of meats all roasted well, each kind to The Hunter's Call you'll sell.

achievements.name: Hunter of Trophy Fish
achievements.description: Receive the Commendation for delivering 25 Trophy Fish to The Hunter's Call.

achievements.name: Hook, Line and Sinker
achievements.description: A platter of each kind of fish will serve the Hunters quite a dish!

achievements.name: Legendary Hunter of the Sea of Thieves
achievements.description: Receive the Commendation for completing 57 Grade 5 Hunter's Call Commendations.

achievements.name: Master of the Hunters
achievements.description: Purchase the Master Hunter Promotion from The Hunter's Call Trading Company.

achievements.name: The Shroudbreaker
achievements.description: A sunken ship and ancient key will set you on a great journey!

achievements.name: The Cursed Rogue
achievements.description: A Cursed Rogue searching, never sleeping. What great secrets is she keeping?

achievements.name: The Legendary Storyteller
achievements.description: Adventures told with a fearless grin. Perhaps some truths might lie within?

achievements.name: Stars of a Thief
achievements.description: The heavens' secrets, now concealed through ancient fable are revealed!

achievements.name: Wild Rose
achievements.description: Jealous wrongs must be set right so two young lovers can unite!

achievements.name: The Art of the Trickster
achievements.description: A shining treasure you must claim, the prize within a deadly game!

achievements.name: The Fate of the Morningstar
achievements.description: Guide three wayward souls to rest, the next step on your golden quest!

achievements.name: Revenge of the Morningstar
achievements.description: Great evil sleeps below the sands, revenge at last within your hands!

achievements.name: The Shores of Gold
achievements.description: Forbidden secrets must be told. What lies beneath the Shores of Gold?

achievements.name: A Sunken Legacy
achievements.description: Receive all Commendations for 'The Shroudbreaker' Tall Tale.

achievements.name: Fateful Memories
achievements.description: Receive all Commendations for 'The Cursed Rogue' Tall Tale.

achievements.name: Sea of Dreams
achievements.description: Receive all Commendations for 'The Legendary Storyteller' Tall Tale.

achievements.name: The Stolen Sky
achievements.description: Receive all Commendations for the 'Stars of a Thief' Tall Tale.

achievements.name: Always Yours
achievements.description: Receive all Commendations for the 'Wild Rose' Tall Tale.

achievements.name: The Trickster's Folly
achievements.description: Receive all Commendations for 'The Art of the Trickster' Tall Tale.

achievements.name: The Unbroken Bond
achievements.description: Receive all Commendations for 'The Fate of the Morningstar' Tall Tale.

achievements.name: The Morningstar Rises
achievements.description: Receive all Commendations for 'The Revenge of the Morningstar' Tall Tale.

achievements.name: Seeker of Grand Adventure
achievements.description: Receive all Commendations for all the Shores of Gold Tall Tales.

achievements.name: Smile, you son of a…
achievements.description: That shark bit off more than it could chew, when it chose to mess with you.

achievements.name: A Spectrum of Shadows
achievements.description: Defeat each colour of Shadow of Fate.

achievements.name: Summoning the Damned
achievements.description: Activate the Fort of the Damned by lighting all six Flames of Fate and sacrificing a Ritual Skull.

achievements.name: Defeating the Damned
achievements.description: Clear the Fort of the Damned of all enemies.

achievements.name: Banishing the Damned
achievements.description: Clear the Fort of the Damned of all enemies, 10 times.

achievements.name: The Seabound Soul
achievements.description: Complete The Seabound Soul

achievements.name: Fire and Ash
achievements.description: Complete all commendations for The Seabound Soul

achievements.name: Tome of Curses I
achievements.description: Sell the Tome of Curses I.

achievements.name: Tome of Curses II
achievements.description: Sell the Tome of Curses II.

achievements.name: Tome of Curses III
achievements.description: Sell the Tome of Curses III.

achievements.name: Tome of Curses IV
achievements.description: Sell the Tome of Curses IV.

achievements.name: Tome of Curses V
achievements.description: Sell the Tome of Curses V.

achievements.name: Tome of Curses Collector
achievements.description: Sell all 5 Tomes of Curses.

achievements.name: Tome of Power I
achievements.description: Sell the Tome of Power I.

achievements.name: Tome of Power II
achievements.description: Sell the Tome of Power II.

achievements.name: Tome of Power III
achievements.description: Sell the Tome of Power III.

achievements.name: Tome of Power IV
achievements.description: Sell the Tome of Power IV

achievements.name: Tome of Power V
achievements.description: Sell the Tome of Power V.

achievements.name: Tome of Power Collector
achievements.description: Sell all 5 Tomes of Power.

achievements.name: Unto the Horizon
achievements.description: Complete the Maiden Voyage

achievements.name: Tome of Fire I
achievements.description: Sell the Tome of Fire I.

achievements.name: Tome of Fire II
achievements.description: Sell the Tome of Fire II.

achievements.name: Tome of Fire III
achievements.description: Sell the Tome of Fire III.

achievements.name: Tome of Fire IV
achievements.description: Sell the Tome of Fire IV.

achievements.name: Tome of Fire V
achievements.description: Sell the Tome of Fire V.

achievements.name: Tome of Fire Collector
achievements.description: Sell all 5 Tomes of Fire.

achievements.name: Tome of Resurrection I
achievements.description: Sell the Tome of Resurrection I.

achievements.name: Tome of Resurrection II
achievements.description: Sell the Tome of Resurrection II.

achievements.name: Tome of Resurrection III
achievements.description: Sell the Tome of Resurrection III.

achievements.name: Tome of Resurrection IV
achievements.description: Sell the Tome of Resurrection IV

achievements.name: Tome of Resurrection V
achievements.description: Sell the Tome of Resurrection V.

achievements.name: Tome of Resurrection Collector
achievements.description: Sell all 5 Tomes of Resurrection.

achievements.name: Heart of Fire
achievements.description: Complete Heart of Fire

achievements.name: The Blackwyche Reborn
achievements.description: Complete all commendations for Heart of Fire

achievements.name: Collector of Legendary Treasures
achievements.description: Find and sell at least one of each Legendary Treasure.

achievements.name: Golden Ticket
achievements.description: Be part of a crew that votes to raise an Emissary Flag for the Gold Hoarders.

achievements.name: Ship of Souls
achievements.description: Be part of a crew that votes to raise an Emissary Flag for the Order of Souls.

achievements.name: Trade Ambassador
achievements.description: Be part of a crew that votes to raise an Emissary Flag for the Merchant Alliance.

achievements.name: For Athena
achievements.description: Be part of a crew that votes to raise an Emissary Flag for Athena's Fortune.

achievements.name: The Reaping Begins
achievements.description: Be part of a crew that votes to raise an Emissary Flag for the Reaper's Bones.

achievements.name: So… Many… Chests!
achievements.description: Be promoted to level 75 with the Gold Hoarders.

achievements.name: Taking Heads
achievements.description: Be promoted to level 75 with the Order of Souls.

achievements.name: Deliverance
achievements.description: Be promoted to level 75 with the Merchant Alliance.

achievements.name: Legen… Wait for it… Dary!
achievements.description: Be promoted to level 20 with Athena's Fortune.

achievements.name: You Reap What You See
achievements.description: Be promoted to level 75 with the Reaper's Bones.

achievements.name: Gold Hoarder Incarnate
achievements.description: Represent the Gold Hoarders in the Captain Tier at the closure of an Emissary Ledger, 5 times.

achievements.name: The Order's Finest
achievements.description: Represent the Order of Souls in the Grandee Tier at the closure of an Emissary Ledger, 5 times.

achievements.name: Employee of the Month
achievements.description: Represent the Merchant Alliance in the Admiral Tier at the closure of an Emissary Ledger, 5 times.

achievements.name: Athena's Greatest
achievements.description: Represent Athena's Fortune in the Legend Tier at the closure of an Emissary Ledger, 5 times.

achievements.name: Feeding the Flame
achievements.description: Represent the Reaper's Bones in the Master Tier at the closure of an Emissary Ledger, 5 times.

achievements.name: Banisher of the Spectral Flame
achievements.description: Defeat the ghost of the Burning Blade 10 times!

achievements.name: Scourge of the Damned
achievements.description: Defeat 500 ghost ships!

achievements.name: Hunter of Captain Grimm
achievements.description: Defeat Captain Grimm 5 times

achievements.name: Hunter of Red Ruth
achievements.description: Defeat Red Ruth 5 times

achievements.name: Hunter of Old Horatio
achievements.description: Defeat Old Horatio 5 times

achievements.name: Hunter of Warden Chi
achievements.description: Defeat Warden Chi 5 times

achievements.name: We Don't Need Maps
achievements.description: Find a Vault Key using only 1 piece of Torn Map Parchment.

achievements.name: Golden Retriever
achievements.description: Open three Treasure Vaults with gold vault keys.

achievements.name: No Mound Left Behind
achievements.description: Pick up all the mounds of gold inside a Treasure Vault.

achievements.name: Wreckless Pursuit
achievements.description: Locate the missing ship on a Lost Shipment Voyage without finding all the clues.

achievements.name: Get Wrecked
achievements.description: On Lost Shipment Voyages, locate a missing ship along each of the Merchants' trade routes.

achievements.name: Many, Many Manifests
achievements.description: Recover 5 Revered Manifests while on Lost Shipment Voyages.

achievements.name: Convenient Stores
achievements.description: Supplies from the Merchants will save you a wait. Buy every Resource and Commodity Crate!

achievements.name: A Pirate's Life
achievements.description: Complete 'A Pirate's Life'.

achievements.name: Mist and Memory
achievements.description: Complete all Commendations for 'A Pirate's Life'.

achievements.name: The Sunken Pearl
achievements.description: Complete 'The Sunken Pearl'.

achievements.name: Pearl in the Dark
achievements.description: Complete all Commendations for 'The Sunken Pearl'.

achievements.name: Captains of the Damned
achievements.description: Complete 'Captains of the Damned'.

achievements.name: Captain of Haunted Waters
achievements.description: Complete all Commendations for 'Captains of the Damned'.

achievements.name: Dark Brethren
achievements.description: Complete 'Dark Brethren'.

achievements.name: Fortress of Sorrow
achievements.description: Complete all Commendations for 'Dark Brethren'.

achievements.name: Lords of the Sea
achievements.description: Complete 'Lords of the Sea'.

achievements.name: An Eternal Pirate Life
achievements.description: Complete all Commendations for 'Lords of the Sea'.

achievements.name: A Pirate's Life for Me
achievements.description: Complete all Commendations for the 'Sea of Thieves: A Pirate's Life' Tall Tales.

achievements.name: Mystery of Hungering
achievements.description: Complete the Mystery of the Shrine of Hungering Commendation.

achievements.name: Mystery of Flooded Embrace
achievements.description: Complete the Mystery of the Shrine of Flooded Embrace Commendation.

achievements.name: Mystery of Ocean's Fortune
achievements.description: Complete the Mystery of the Shrine of Ocean's Fortune Commendation.

achievements.name: Mystery of the Coral Tomb
achievements.description: Complete the Mystery of the Shrine of the Coral Tomb Commendation.

achievements.name: Mystery of Ancient Tears
achievements.description: Complete the Mystery of the Shrine of Ancient Tears Commendation.

achievements.name: Mystery of Tribute
achievements.description: Complete the Mystery of the Shrine of Tribute Commendation.

achievements.name: Sunken Kingdom Marauder
achievements.description: Complete the Marauder of the Sunken Kingdom Commendation.

achievements.name: Seeker of the Sea
achievements.description: Complete the Seeker of the Sea Commendation.

achievements.name: Legend of the Sunken Kingdom
achievements.description: Complete all Sunken Kingdom Commendations.

achievements.name: Stolen Secrets
achievements.description: You stole a Map Bundle from another crew.

achievements.name: Who Needs A Bigger Boat?
achievements.description: You attacked a Megalodon or Kraken using a Cannon Rowboat.

achievements.name: Night-Time Spectacular
achievements.description: You set off a display of five or more fireworks at night.

achievements.name: Tribute Seat
achievements.description: You took a seat upon the throne during the 'Shores of Gold' Tall Tale.

achievements.name: Sleepover
achievements.description: Sleep in a bed aboard another crew's ship.

achievements.name: Critical Roll
achievements.description: You rolled a natural 20 using the Roll a D20 Emote.

achievements.name: Hider of Secret Treasures
achievements.description: You buried treasures for safekeeping.

achievements.name: Master Cartographer
achievements.description: You donated Treasure Stash maps to a Quest Board.

achievements.name: Seeker of Pirate Plunder
achievements.description: You uncovered valuable treasures buried by other pirate crews.

achievements.name: Beholder of Buried Treasures
achievements.description: You completed all Buried Treasures Commendations.

achievements.name: What's Yours Is Mine
achievements.description: Open a Sea Fort Treasury

achievements.name: Master Burglar
achievements.description: Discover 100 secret stashed treasures on a Sea Fort

achievements.name: From Whence They Came
achievements.description: Defeat 250 Sea Fort Phantoms

achievements.name: Veil Seeker
achievements.description: Complete 100 Legend of the Veil Quests

achievements.name: Legendary Loot Seller
achievements.description: Sell 500 Legendary Treasures

achievements.name: True Legend
achievements.description: Complete 25 Legend of the Veil Voyages as a Grade 5 Athena Emissary

achievements.name: O Captain!
achievements.description: Set sail on a Captained ship as one of the crew.

achievements.name: The Quartermaster
achievements.description: Stock your ship with each type of supply using the Ship's Manifest.

achievements.name: A Crewed Wisdom
achievements.description: Read another crew's Captain's Log.

achievements.name: The Art Collector
achievements.description: Place 15 trinkets aboard a Captained ship at once.

achievements.name: Ready for Next Time
achievements.description: Save a fully-decorated, Captained ship in the Ship Decoration Chest.

achievements.name: Chasing the Horizon
achievements.description: Spend 10 days at sea aboard a Captained ship, either as the Captain or one of the crew.

achievements.name: A Veteran Voyager
achievements.description: Complete 30 Voyages aboard a Captained Ship.

achievements.name: A Touch of Class
achievements.description: Hand in 200 treasure items to the Sovereigns.

achievements.name: That's 'Captain', Mate...
achievements.description: Set sail as a Captain of Adventure for the first time.

achievements.name: Spared No Expense
achievements.description: Purchase a cherished trinket.

achievements.name: A Professional Pirate
achievements.description: Unlock a Legendary Title by progressing your Pirate Milestones.

achievements.name: A Seasoned Ship
achievements.description: Unlock a Legendary Ship Title by progressing your Ship Milestones.

achievements.name: A Fleeting Fancy
achievements.description: Own 15 ships.

achievements.name: You Gotta Fight
achievements.description: Win your first fight in the Battle for the Sea of Thieves.

achievements.name: A Sunken Century
achievements.description: Sink 100 Faction ships in the Battle for the Sea of Thieves.

achievements.name: Nigh Unsinkable!
achievements.description: Earn an Allegiance Streak of 4 for either Faction.

achievements.name: Blessing of Athena's Fortune
achievements.description: Receive the Blessing of Athena's Fortune.

achievements.name: Ritual of the Flame
achievements.description: Undergo the Ritual of the Flame.

achievements.name: Getting A Head
achievements.description: Uncover a Skull of Destiny.

achievements.name: Hot-Headed
achievements.description: Use a Skull of Destiny to begin 3 Fort of the Damned events.

achievements.name: Fortune-ate Outcome
achievements.description: Conquer 3 Forts of Fortune.

achievements.name: A Favour for the Flame
achievements.description: Hand in 30 Reaper's Chests or Reaper's Bounties.

achievements.name: Favour the Bold
achievements.description: Hand in 30 Chests of Fortune.

achievements.name: The Journey to Mêlée Island
achievements.description: Complete 'The Journey to Mêlée Island' Commendation.

achievements.name: Mêlée Island Investigator
achievements.description: Complete all Commendations for 'The Journey to Mêlée Island'.

achievements.name: The Quest for Guybrush
achievements.description: Complete 'The Quest for Guybrush' Commendation.

achievements.name: Legendary Trial Master
achievements.description: Complete all Commendations for 'The Quest for Guybrush'.

achievements.name: The Lair of LeChuck
achievements.description: You completed The Lair of LeChuck.

achievements.name: Do the Monkey!
achievements.description: You completed all Commendations for 'The Lair of LeChuck'.

achievements.name: Legend of Monkey Island
achievements.description: You completed all Commendations for 'The Legend of Monkey Island' Tall Tales

achievements.name: Guild Initiate
achievements.description: Set sail on a ship enrolled in a Guild to which you belong.

achievements.name: Sworn Guild Captain
achievements.description: Pledge a Captained Ship to a Guild.

achievements.name: Emissary of Guilds
achievements.description: Become a Guild Emissary for the first time for a Guild to which you belong.

achievements.name: Distinguished Guild Member
achievements.description: Set sail representing a Guild you are a member of with Distinction 1 or higher.

achievements.name: Legendary Guild Chef
achievements.description: Complete all 'Chef' Guild Commendations.

achievements.name: Legendary Guild Cannoneer
achievements.description: Complete all 'Cannoneer' Guild Commendations.

achievements.name: Legendary Guild Navigator
achievements.description: Complete all 'Navigator' Guild Commendations.

achievements.name: Legendary Guild Helm
achievements.description: Complete all 'Helm' Guild Commendations.

achievements.name: Distinguished Guild Legend
achievements.description: Complete 'Distinguished' Guild Commendations.

achievements.name: Master of Siren Song
achievements.description: Awarded the Commendation 'Seeker of The Siren Song Grade 5'

achievements.name: Liberator of Siren Song
achievements.description: Awarded the Commendation 'Sentry of the Siren Song Grade 5'

achievements.name: Sacrifice of Siren Song
achievements.description: Sink a ship carrying a Siren Song Treasure

achievements.name: Novice of Siren Song
achievements.description: Awarded the Commendation 'Savior of the Siren Song Grade 1'

achievements.name: Guardian of Siren Song
achievements.description: Awarded the Commendation 'Savior of the Siren Song Grade 5'

achievements.name: Seeking Sanctuary
achievements.description: Pay a visit to the beautiful Sanctuary Outpost.

achievements.name: Port of Call
achievements.description: Pay a visit to the sprawling Port Merrick.

achievements.name: The Wonder of Plunder
achievements.description: Pay a visit to the towering Plunder Outpost.

achievements.name: Be In-Spired
achievements.description: Pay a visit to the unforgettable Ancient Spire Outpost.

achievements.name: A Wild Excursion
achievements.description: Pay a visit to the imposing Dagger Tooth Outpost.

achievements.name: Pay Your Respects
achievements.description: Pay a visit to the mysterious Galleon’s Grave Outpost.

achievements.name: Pirate of Distinction
achievements.description: Earn a Distinction for any Trading Company.

achievements.name: Just Getting Started
achievements.description: Complete the Tutorial Voyage for the Gold Hoarders, Merchant Alliance and Order of Souls.

achievements.name: Voyager of Gold
achievements.description: Dive to, and complete, a Voyage for the Gold Hoarders.

achievements.name: Voyager of the Soul
achievements.description: Dive to, and complete, a Voyage for the Order of Souls.

achievements.name: Voyager for the Alliance
achievements.description: Dive to, and complete, a Voyage for the Merchant Alliance.

achievements.name: Legendary Plunge
achievements.description: Dive to, and complete, a Voyage for Athena's Fortune.

achievements.name: Rib Roast
achievements.description: Defeat an Ashen Lord with the Double Barrel Pistol.

achievements.name: Title Fight
achievements.description: Defeat a Skeleton Lord with a ranged throwing knife attack.

achievements.name: Krack Shot
achievements.description: Hit a Kraken tentacle with scattershot.

achievements.name: A Clash of Bones
achievements.description: Defeat an enemy Bone Caller Skeleton with your own Bone Caller Skeleton.

achievements.name: Smooth Landing
achievements.description: Use the Horn of Fair Winds to avoid fall damage from a great height.

achievements.name: Walk the Line
achievements.description: Travel 5 km walking along harpoon tightropes.

achievements.name: This One's To Go
achievements.description: Use a zipline while carrying a treasure chest on your back.

achievements.name: Crew of the Burning Blade
achievements.description: Pledge your crew to the Burning Blade.

achievements.name: Burning Vengeance
achievements.description: Defeat the Burning Blade.

achievements.name: Sweltering Sword
achievements.description: Sell a Blade of Souls.

achievements.name: Hot Shot
achievements.description: Complete the 'Hot Shot' Commendation.

achievements.name: Sizzling Sinker
achievements.description: Complete the 'Sizzling Sinker' Commendation.

achievements.name: Playing the Part
achievements.description: Complete the 'Playing the Part' Commendation.

achievements.name: Astral Protection
achievements.description: Complete the 'Astral Protection' Commendation.

achievements.name: Defender of the Pirate's Life
achievements.description: Complete the 'Defender of the Pirate's Life' Commendation.

achievements.name: Loyalist of the Flame
achievements.description: Complete the 'Loyalist of the Flame' Commendation.

achievements.name: Pressgang Grappler
achievements.description: Complete the 'Pressgang Grappler' Commendation.

achievements.name: Enticing Explosion

achievements.description: Complete the 'Comfortable Sneaker' Commendation.

achievements.name: Hidden in Plain Sight
achievements.description: Complete the 'Hidden in Plain Sight' Commendation.

achievements.name: Hung Out to Dry
achievements.description: Complete the 'Hung Out to Dry' Commendation.

achievements.name: Red Alert Raider
achievements.description: Complete the 'Red Alert Raider' Commendation.

achievements.name: Hunter of the Noble Voyage
achievements.description: Dive to and complete a Hunter's Call Voyage.

achievements.name: You're Going to Need a Bigger Bucket!
achievements.description: Attempt to extinguish the Ancient Feared Redmaw with a water bucket.

achievements.name: Eel-ectric Tide
achievements.description: Kill an Eel-ectric Ocean Crawler with a Trident of Dark Tides during a Barnacled Dread attack.

achievements.name: Sea Beast Spear Hunter
achievements.description: Hit Krakens, Megalodons or Ancient Megalodons using hunting spears.

achievements.name: Voyager of Bones

achievements.name: Crew of Bone and Blade

achievements.name: Devious Dinghy

achievements.name: Marked Smuggler

achievements.name: Smugglers' Riches

achievements.name: Smuggler at Sea
